name: Governor - Simple, Voting Token
description: Enables proposal-based governance system using the voting tokens as voting power.

constructorDecorators.name: Constructor
constructorDecorators.description: Creates new Governance system based on the given voting token.

parameterDecorators.name: Voting token
parameterDecorators.description: Voting token to be used as the voting power source.

parameterDecorators.name: Voting delay
parameterDecorators.description: How long after a proposal is created should voting power be fixed. A large voting delay gives users time to unstake tokens if necessary.

parameterDecorators.name: Voting period
parameterDecorators.description: How long does a proposal remain open to votes.

parameterDecorators.name: Proposal threshold
parameterDecorators.description: The number of votes required in order for a voter to become a proposer.

parameterDecorators.name: Quorum percentage (0-100)
parameterDecorators.description: Minimum number of votes casted, as a percentage of total votes available in the system, required to reach a quorum.
